about.summary: Performs Bayesian calibration of computer models as per Kennedy and O'Hagan 2001.  The package includes routines to find the hyperparameters and parameters; see the help page for stage1() for a worked example using the toy dataset.  A tutorial is provided in the calex.Rnw vignette; and a suite of especially simple one dimensional examples appears in inst/doc/one.dim/.

Performs Bayesian calibration of computer models as per Kennedy and O'Hagan 2001.  The package includes routines to find the hyperparameters and parameters; see the help page for stage1() for a worked example using the toy dataset.  A tutorial is provided in the calex.Rnw vignette; and a suite of especially simple one dimensional examples appears in inst/doc/one.dim/.

name: r-calibrator
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.2-8' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-calibrator
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/calibrator_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/calibrator/calibrator_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5e04742c84dec56461c38dd5a64faff348871703142c55de94a9996ceb0d2fd5

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cubature
    - r-emulator >=1.2_11
    - r-mvtnorm
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cubature
    - r-emulator >=1.2_11
    - r-mvtnorm

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('calibrator')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('calibrator')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/RobinHankin/calibrator.git
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Performs Bayesian calibration of computer models as per Kennedy and O'Hagan 2001.  The
    package includes routines to find the hyperparameters and parameters; see the help
    page for stage1() for a worked example using the toy dataset.  A tutorial is provided
    in the calex.Rnw vignette; and a suite of especially simple one dimensional examples
    appears in inst/doc/one.dim/.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
